channel.title: Conversations with jacmob
channel.description:
Answers some unanswered questions
[code]<t4> the change of heart? one can't just go from making god know's what per month to nothing over 'morality' <Jacmob> money from rsbuddy is insignificant to me <t4> if it was a moral decision, especially regarding gold farmers - you could have combated that <t4> furthermore, no one has seen your final update to RSBuddy <Jacmob> it wasnt simply a moral decision, it was somewhat more complex than that <Jacmob> the last update to rsbuddy was last friday <_^_> Jacmob <t4> so you released a working copy? * Discardedx2 has quit (Quit: Leaving) <_^_> unban from #rsbuddy & #rscode <_^_> ty <_^_> plz <_^_> thx <Jacmob> a few people on mumble saw - it was updated with player, npc, projection, input, and widget hooks <t4> okay, back to the decision to shut rsbuddy down <Jacmob> people massively overhyped this cluster flutterer release of course <Jacmob> idk why people like Speljohan_ made idiotic comments about it being impossible to deal with <t4> it seems as if you were threatened or bribed in the same manner Speljohan_ was. <Mopman> to be fiar, he didnt <Mopman> he made one comment and it got blown up <Mopman> by other people <Jacmob> ah okay <Mopman> Jacmob: is it true youre owrking at jagex nao? :P <Mopman> njo hate or anything im just curious <Jacmob> yes <t4> specially frell <Mopman> Jacmob: thats awesome, gz <Jacmob> well i havent started yet Mopman <t4> Jacmob: i have no problem with your decision btw <Mopman> IF I APLLY TO SOME SHIT DEPT LIKE CUSTOMER SERVICE CAN YOU TELL THEM HOW HARD WORKING AND WONDERUFL I AM LOLOL <t4> just wish you were a bit more open to what exactly transpired <Mopman> Jacmob: are you gonna be moving to cambridge? or are you already near by <ramen> Mopman, you should get a job at jagex too <ramen> resume: administrator on moparisthebest.com <Jacmob> since im still at skl in london for now sorting out access and collaboration is still in progress <Jacmob> after that if i'm in cambridge at uni there's less of an issue <Mopman> jagex is just a blap down the a14 for me <Mopman> ive considered applying to jagex before but id never get aj ob there lol <Jacmob> i dont want that repeated really but i guess some people will feel the need to go spreading it around <_^_> Mopman: what was the comment <Mopman> its already <Mopman> massive rumour man <Mopman> ive been told about 50 times in the last 2 days <Mopman> thats why i asked <Jacmob> of course, that's fine <t4> yeah Jacmob, for one i won't spread this convo <Jacmob> just don't want to confirm yet <_^_> <Mopman> ive considered applying to jagex before but id never get aj ob there lol <t4> although others will <_^_> you are not genius material <_^_> you're above average at best <_^_> don't consider <Jacmob> but i'm tired of rumours at this point so w/e <t4> Jacmob: so, they hired you under the ground to shut down rsbuddy? <Jacmob> especially bullshit about how i love money when i've turned down making plenty of money of numerous occasions <Jacmob> on* <_^_> t4 how important was rsbuddy to you <ramen> rsbuddy was t4's life <t4> _^_: not so much <Jacmob> no t4 <Jacmob> not to shut down rsbuddy <Jacmob> to work on the game engine <Jacmob> more detail about that is confidential though <Mopman> Jacmob: did you actually show them your bot as leverage for this job <Mopman> cuz im surprised theyd hire <Mopman> like <Mopman> an undergrad <Mopman> for real code <Mopman> these days <Mopman> thats pretty cool <Jacmob> there are other factors <t4> so you weren't ordered to stop the production of rsbuddy, Jacmob ? <Mopman> t4: haha, its pretty obvious <Mopman> that he couldnt continuewhile working there <t4> Mopman: well duh <Jacmob> oh ofc i had to stop rsbuddy <Jacmob> indeed, rsbuddy would have become much harder to keep running <Jacmob> it would inevitably have gone down within a few months at most <t4> Jacmob: so you would say it was less of a threat, more of an opportunity? * Davidi2_LINUX is now known as Davidi2 <Mopman> Jacmob: so they do know exactly who you are <Mopman> is what i was really wondering <Mopman> hehe <Jacmob> they know exactly who a lot of people are <Mopman> heh <t4> i'm referring to what transpired between you and jagex <Mopman> RUH OH <Jacmob> i agreed with jagex about a lot of things t4 <t4> such as? <Jacmob> i didnt make rsbuddy because i love the idea of people cheating in runescape <ramen> is this confiedntialinformation <Jacmob> i am pretty indifferent to the issue <Mopman> i can honestly see * SeanWT (pre@mopar-FE7F5534.sgyl.cable.virginmedia.com) has joined #mopar <Mopman> that position <Mopman> like, there was talk among the people who devd aryan (ohi SeanWT ) <Mopman> about how not all of them <Mopman> were happy with <Mopman> its impact on the game <t4> Jacmob: i actually hate botting/botters <Jacmob> the impact on the game is complex as is my position of it <Jacmob> on* <t4> they really exploit the system <Jacmob> gold farmers exploit the system <Jacmob> i already had plans to shut them out <Jacmob> but as long as there's botting <Jacmob> there will be a bot developer <Jacmob> who doesnt care to <SeanWT> im going to start a gold farm <t4> the users do too, Jacmob :P <Mopman> plant gold seeds <SeanWT> I bought 20 of sams future children <t4> frost dragon scripts, barrows scripts <Jacmob> yes but it's a spectrum t4 <SeanWT> he said he would fulfil the order within a week <t4> seriously :P <SeanWT> he must be a pimp <Jacmob> and there's a threshold <Brolapse> Speljohan_, we shud play bf3 sometime <Brolapse> i need to get a mic tho <t4> Jacmob: you made a statement about optical bots earlier <Jacmob> what aobut them <t4> something to the extent of how they'll be obsolete <_^_> SeanWT is here <_^_> wow <Jacmob> ah ya well <_^_> have i stepped 5 years into the past <Mopman> it happens sometimes <SeanWT> _^_ more like 8 <SeanWT> yuoungin <SeanWT> *youngin <t4> do you have any insight on how they'd (jagex) accomplish that feat? <Jacmob> the idea is to reduce grind, but of course that's not a simple thing to do <_^_> SeanWT: fair <SeanWT> Jacmob youd only have to entirely change the game <Mopman> the fact that Jacmob is still here <Jacmob> these screen scraping bots are very limited <Mopman> and hasnt been banned from talking to us <_^_> yeah <Mopman> makes me think they want to turn him into some fucking <Mopman> botter liason <Mopman> hahaha <SeanWT> ban him cha cha cha <_^_> he's the official jagex ambassador to the cheating community <_^_> :D <Mopman> Jacmob: THE MOUTHPIECE OF JAGEX <Jacmob> well im not actually in cambridge atm <t4> Jacmob: do go on <_^_> Jacmob: did they have any contractual stipulations regarding what contact you are to have with the cheaters ? <Jacmob> of course there may well be more detection methods coming for screen scrapers <Jacmob> but i prefer the idea of making them obsolete <Jacmob> because removing bots changes the gameplay <Jacmob> and in some respects that change is for the worse <Jacmob> it would have been easier on me if the gameplay changes had come first of course :p <t4> what about the 12 year olds that have billions in the bank and several 99s, is Jagex going to do anything about them? :P <Jacmob> no <SeanWT> t4 they have already broke their own game multiple time because of us <SeanWT> they dont want to go banning because of assumption of guilt <t4> well that sure stinks, Jacmob - there will be such a divide in the runescape community <Jacmob> well there's no perfect solution <SeanWT> there will always be divides <_^_> several former botters have declared that they will go back to playing legit <SeanWT> look at party hats <Jacmob> runescape has outgrown its original gameplay <SeanWT> how much fucking money are they worth now <Jacmob> and its hard to make it work well <t4> SeanWT: ~1.5b+ <_^_> i would imagine they are refraining from banning people because they have found that they don't come back afterwards <SeanWT> t4 in real money? <_^_> it leaves a deep scar on their young fragile noob hearts <t4> SeanWT: gp, obv - around 800 usd+ <Cbot> Jacmob: you said it was meant for compatibility when it first came out right? <SeanWT> so insane <Jacmob> well having removed bots, it's preferable not to have to punish the people who were so easily able to run them <SeanWT> i gave most of mine away on christmas because my friends werent on for the drops <Mopman> i remember selling my santas for like 15k <Mopman> in retrospect <Mopman> bad idea <SeanWT> indeed <_^_> durr <SeanWT> we have had periods of bots vanishing <SeanWT> they will come back <SeanWT> no matter what jagex does it will always be counterable <Jacmob> anyway i would refund people for longer periods <Cbot> Mopman: those 5-7 years of waiting wouldn't have been worth it <Mopman> SeanWT: lets do it <Jacmob> unfortunately <ramen> cool and Jacmob will probably get to know how far off the refactored namings in clients are <Jacmob> that would mean me having to pay costs <SeanWT> its just a whole different ball game right now, but people will do it <_^_> SeanWT: i am worried that RS will not be coming back though <Jacmob> ie i would have lost money by starting rsbuddy <_^_> i'm sure you've already seen this <_^_> but <SeanWT> _^_ im shocked its even still alive <SeanWT> I hated rs2 <SeanWT> rsc pking is where it was a <SeanWT> t <Jacmob> because i payed out so much of the turnover on expenses <SeanWT> *at <_^_> http://www.google.com/trends?q=runescape&ctab=0&geo=all&date=all&sort=0 <Mopman> Jacmob: wtf expensis did yo ueven have <Mopman> iu cant understand how it was that high <t4> mk Jacmob one last question i suppose <Mopman> or were you just bad at monetising :P <SeanWT> runescape had its place back in the day why anyone continues to play it is beyond me <Jacmob> since i wanted a big infrastructure rather than more money <SeanWT> but with the money jagex has im sure they can offer something of value <_^_> SeanWT: have you noticed that everyone thinks that runescape was best during whatever time they happened to join it, and everything afterwards is crap ? <t4> what do you foresee for the future of runescape and runescape cheating? <Jacmob> i never bothered to obsolete scripting since i liked that people were able to work on scripts <Mopman> _^_: except the people who played rsc, are right <Jacmob> and agreed to pay out 60% otherwise the quality would have been even worse <_^_> Mopman: suck on a live grenade <Jacmob> then there were legal things <Mopman> :P <SeanWT> _^_ well I dont believe ive ever known anyone who loved rs2 but I quit the scene after the change and barely had anything to do when doign rs2 <Jacmob> preparing for jagex issues, i'm still suing paris <SeanWT> but you have a point <SeanWT> but I just hated the pking system in rs2 <Mopman> Jacmob: youre suing paris? i didnt even fuckin know that <Mopman> haha <Mopman> what for <Jacmob> rsbuddy's hosting is ridiculous <_^_> paris as in the city <_^_> or <SeanWT> i thought the engine was neat and wrote a bot for it <_^_> a person called paris <Mopman> no paris as in the guy <Mopman> duh <Jacmob> we have anycast dns routing to 5 datacenters <_^_> WHAT GUY <ramen> ins3 <Cbot> _^_: ins3 if you know him <_^_> seen around, don't know <Mopman> rsbot <Cbot> that guy that took over speljohan's bot <t4> Jacmob: what do you foresee for the future of runescape and runescape cheating? <_^_> Speljohan_ made a bot ?? <Jacmob> yea the ass hole who does actually want max cash <ramen> THE FUTURE IS BLEAK <Mopman> _^_: srsly? <_^_> that wasn't a 1% completed load of fuck <_^_> ? <Cbot> hes trolling <_^_> am not <_^_> unless you mean <SeanWT> rsc pking was basically like flipping a coin, yet it was incredibly fun and intense, when I played rs2 the wildy was a clusterfuck though I know they later removed it.... which sounded even worse <Mopman> johan made rsbot originally.. <_^_> the thing that zerofreeze commissioned <Jacmob> well t4 i expect runescape cheating to end and runescape to change its gameplay <Mopman> no <_^_> ohh <Cbot> omg <_^_> right <_^_> ok <Mopman> that was after <Cbot> not zetabot lol <_^_> yeah zetabot <_^_> not zetabot <Mopman> zetabot was a POS <Cbot> I still have the source for it <Mopman> there i said it <Cbot> somewhere <Mopman> dont hurt me <Cbot> it was good for the 3 days it was up <_^_> it is truley amazing <ramen> Mopman, POS? <Jacmob> im happy to sue paris since he's been an ass hole to plenty of people <ramen> point of <_^_> how quickley jagex has brainwashed you into believing this is possible <Mopman> Jacmob: its funny, people said that when they first started using obfuscation <Mopman> and when they first broke google <Mopman> etc <Mopman> its never happened <_^_> runescape cheating will continue as long as people play runescape on computers that aren't owned by jagex <_^_> it is that simple <SeanWT> indeed <Cbot> or is it <Jacmob> yea but this time the threshold that's being pushed is different Mopman <Mopman> this is like apolcalypse #5 <Mopman> Jacmob: peopel always say that, too :p <SeanWT> so what <_^_> well <_^_> i agree with Jacmob on that last point <_^_> it's a new frontier <_^_> the new bot is the neural network bot <SeanWT> runescape had 13 year olds who didnt know shit writing bots for runescape, look at richyt, WoW had much more intelligent people hackign away at its codebase <Jacmob> fair enough, but the analysis in real terms that leads to that conclusion suggests that it really won't be worth writing the software now <_^_> of course old SCAR will chug alone galliantly <SeanWT> just because the threshold increases dosent mean it goes away <Jacmob> this is different in that jagex really has taken loss to remove bots <_^_> the most effective method <_^_> is just manual mass banning <Jacmob> nothing near this significant <SeanWT> theyve been hacking away at their limbs for years to stop bots, random events was meant to be the bot killer of rs2 <SeanWT> people will adapat <Jacmob> is that a joke <_^_> well <_^_> ok <_^_> seriously <_^_> there is no point in having this debate <_^_> let me just say this to Jacmob <Jacmob> you can't seriously say that jagex have been working their limbs off to stop botting <_^_> in what i hope represents the aggregate sentiment of the cheating community <_^_> after this update <Mopman> in the past thye have <_^_> : <Mopman> they go through phases <_^_> bring it on <_^_> " <Mopman> of being very passive and very active <SeanWT> hacking their limbs off by destroying their game in attempts to stop botting <SeanWT> not working their limbs off <SeanWT> is what I meant <SeanWT> and they have <SeanWT> I know jagex take drastic measures <Jacmob> and you can only argue either way with quantitative data <SeanWT> I often feel to their detrament <SeanWT> as far as gameplay is concerned <Jacmob> which i can't relate so we'll have to wait and see <Mopman> at least this update didnt detrimentally affect gameplay <_^_> heh <SeanWT> Mopman other than performance <Mopman> performance of the client, sure, but the game itself stayed <_^_> +1 Mopman <SeanWT> and removing the unsigned client apparently <Jacmob> this update isnt finished <Jacmob> this update is actually quite far from finished <Mopman> haha <Mopman> care to share <Mopman> :>:> <SeanWT> the boogey man wants you scared <SeanWT> DONT LOOK UNDER THE BED KIDS <Jacmob> in fact what's happend so far is overhyped and mediocre <SeanWT> id agree with that <Mopman> ive been trying to underhype it and people keep telling me im naive <Mopman> so i can only assume theres more to it than ive seen <_^_> Jacmob, what realistic measures can their be against screenreading bots <Jacmob> the new obfuscation is a good basis to make analysis a bigger pain <SeanWT> I said it from the day of the patch that "this isnt it" <Mopman> _^_: screenreading as in scar? <_^_> there be ( <_^_> wow <Jacmob> but in and of itself isnt much <Mopman> well simba* <_^_> i type like a retard <SeanWT> there may be a lul <SeanWT> but it will end <Mopman> tough <Mopman> whos gonna end it <Mopman> atm <Mopman> i have no idea <SeanWT> frank prolly <SeanWT> :P <Mopman> hahaha <_^_> frank is a lazy bag <Mopman> frank could <Mopman> but he wont <_^_> he is too lazy <_^_> he's old and fat and bald <SeanWT> franks smart enough to do it if mopar dips into his fund <Mopman> mopar will dip into his fund <_^_> his spry youth is a distant memory in the rearview mirror of the sunset <Mopman> i shouldnt be promising things on behalf of mopar <Mopman> but <Mopman> fuck it <Mopman> he would [/code]
[code] <Mopman> does anyone knwo whya ndrew left btw <_^_> or something <Mopman> it seemed <SeanWT> that just makes it look faggy <Mopman> like <Mopman> bad <Mopman> like somethign went down <SeanWT> Mopman because he was rich? <Mopman> dramaz <Mopman> nah it seemd way more than that <Jacmob> no Mopman hes still there <Jacmob> thats just a rumour <Mopman> Jacmob: define "there" <_^_> and the fact that andrew is worth 300mill whatever the british currency is <_^_> ? * SeanWT slaps eXemplar around a bit with a large dildo <Mopman> he no longer holds any shares and has formed another studio <Jacmob> in the office frequently <Mopman> that seems like hes left to me <Mopman> oh hes still around <Mopman> ok [/code]
something obvious: [code]<Jacmob> jagex were going to take down rsbuddy at some point if i hadn't decided to stop it [/code]
[code] <Jacmob> i dont trust jagex to do more than stop botting for a few weeks, but i trust myself to do it <Jacmob> of course it's very easy for me to trust myself <unhandled> http://franklyfrank.info/quote/10 <SeanWT> well if anyones going to trust you, it would be yourself <Mopman> eXemplar: are you writing it in ruby <SeanWT> I dont <eXemplar> no, because i'm not gay <Mopman> lol <eXemplar> hey Mopman, hows the mod tracker <Mopman> fuck ya then <Mopman> eXemplar: haha <Mopman> i got lazy :( <SeanWT> eXemplar you make me love you more everyday <Mopman> i mean <Mopman> i had other things <Mopman> to do <eXemplar> yes, you are clearly a man with a lot on his plate :P <Mopman> 22:55:08 Jacmob | i dont trust jagex to do more than stop botting for a few weeks, but i trust myself to do it <Mopman> so is your role at jagex going to be anti cheat focused <SeanWT> eXemplar why arent you asking about his 3d space game with seemless planteary flying <Jacmob> no Mopman <Mopman> he didnt know about that <Mopman> stfu <Mopman> ok <SeanWT> or his html5 turned java game <eXemplar> SeanWT: go on? <Jacmob> but i still have a feeling <Mopman> WILL YOU STOP IT <Jacmob> that even though they've implemented something good <Jacmob> it won't be enough <Mopman> eXemplar: why dont you ask sean about his orgy with 2 males <SeanWT> eXemplar have you seen that video thats been out for years <Cbot> what exactly did jagex do <SeanWT> about the guy who has a space sim that u fly around in <Jacmob> and as such i will take it further than it probably needs to go if given the chance :p [/code]
over 20k chars http://pastie.org/private/y0icbsmgputhtuvtkqtzw
will post more if anything interesting occurs.

item.title: Conversations with jacmob
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:25, topic:420745”] <Yohanu> Mopman: the client is AES encryped now <lawl> the fuck r u guys asking me <Mopman> hes russian and he does blood trasnfusions <Yohanu> jagex can sue anyone reversing it <sppt> recent == <4 weeks <lawl> so many stupid questions for <Yohanu> and spreading <Mopman> Yohanu: what do u mean the client is aes encrypted <Brolapse> Yohanu, link to allah <Mopman> and uh <Yohanu> the classes Mopman

en.wikipedia.org

Computer Misuse Act 1990

The Computer Misuse Act 1990 is an Act of the Parliament of the United Kingdom, introduced partly in response to the decision in R v Gold & Schifreen (1988) 1 AC 1063 (see below). Critics of the bill complained that it was introduced hastily and was poorly thought out.[who?] Intention, they said, was often difficult to prove, and that the bill inadequately differentiated "joyriding" hackers like Gold and Schifreen from serious computer criminals. The Act has nonetheless become a model from which ...

etc…[/quote]
I like how you kept the part where me and lawl talked about his anal bleedings in the quote.

Read full topic

Computer Misuse Act 1990

The Computer Misuse Act 1990 is an Act of the Parliament of the United Kingdom, introduced partly in response to the decision in R v Gold & Schifreen (1988) 1 AC 1063 (see below). Critics of the bill complained that it was introduced hastily and was poorly thought out.[who?] Intention, they said, was often difficult to prove, and that the bill inadequately differentiated "joyriding" hackers like Gold and Schifreen from serious computer criminals. The Act has nonetheless become a model from which ...

item.title: Conversations with jacmob
item.dc:creator: @Wizzup Wizzup?
item.description:
@Wizzup wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:19, topic:420745”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=523421.msg3807564#msg3807564 date=1320605450]

I don’t believe one bit of it. Remember Kaitnieks? Thought he made a deal with Jagex and got insta-banned.

Actually, I don’t remember that? I remember that happening to Dylock…
[/quote]

I thought it was dylock too. Jagex offered free membership for whoever showed how the duping bug was done, iirc. Then they banned him.[/quote]

Perhaps my memory is playing tricks on me.

Read full topic

item.title: Conversations with jacmob
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

<frank_> i haved one together so that i could mostly decompile the client
<frank_> hacked one*
<frank_> super_, is this what they use instead of instanceof? http://pastebin.com/n7CWawDd
<super_> if its like
<lawl> its illegal in ur state
<Mopman> lol some of the quote on these cryptocgrams
<super_> aload dup ifnonnull arraylength bipush if_icmpeq
<Mopman> make me think im doing it wrong
<super_> if its like that
<Mopman> because the phrase makes no sense
<super_> then yes
<Mopman> then it does
<Mopman> "since when is public safety the root password to the constitution"
<Mopman> i had root password and saw constitution and was like...wat
<Mopman> guys can we start ruining another game
<Mopman> rs is no fun now and theye wrecked their own performance anyway
<Mopman> thsi is a win
<frank_> runescape too hard for you?
<Mopman> yes
<Mopman> yes it is
<frank_> someone should write a bot so they get the fucking message to stop making it so grindy
<Mopman> or they just do something else annoying asn dtime consuming nad gay
<Mopman> FACE IT THEY WON
<Mopman> even you cant be btohered anymore
<frank_> rong
<lawl> lol i was showing my mom voice recognition on phone
<lawl> so i said 'send photo' or some shit
<frank_> i couldnt be bothered when noobs like jacmob were in control
<lawl> and it wrote 'some f***'
<lawl> i wasl iek wtf
<Mopman> thats y ur deobfuscator is coming along swimmingly i assume :P
<lawl> it wrote the *'s tho
<frank_> tbh, for the most part it works fine
<t4> frank_: they hire people like Jacmob but not you? :(
<Mopman> we dont know jacmob is hired 
<Mopman> he could well just be bullshitting
<frank_> how old is jacmob?
<t4> i guess
<t4> frank_: 17 or 18
<Mopman> especially since apparently he said "back from runefest" on the day is started
<Mopman> it*
<frank_> then no, he hasnt been hired
<frank_> he probably got accepted to oxbridge or something
<Mopman> he said hes goign to cambridge
<t4> frank_: what makes you conclude this
<frank_> iirc jagex do work exp from cambridge
<Mopman> they do work experience from like
<Mopman> all the big unis
<Mopman> they always have stalls at the sandwich recruitment shits
<Mopman> for example they were in leeds
<Mopman> and thats nowhere near cambrdige
<frank_> who the fuck would give up the intellectual challenge if they were in his position?
<Mopman> lul
* jme has quit (Ping timeout)
<t4> frank_: maybe he got some big buckeroos from jagex
<Mopman> its possible that jagex offfered him a sandwich placement i guess
<Mopman> on his uni course
<frank_> why would they hire him when they can scare him away with lawyers
<Mopman> "hey kid, when youre doing your placement, ill put in a good word for you"
<Mopman> "IF you stop what youre doing"
<Mopman> "wink wink"
<lawl> np: Mezzoforte - Hard Wired [00:13 of 04:43] [987kbps]
<frank_> what does he mean when he took rsbuddy to runefest?
<lawl> :O
<super_> frank_, 
<frank_> he had it on a thumb drive in his pocket?
<super_> he fixed it
<t4> frank_: flash drive
<Mopman> frank_: afaict he meant he took a working update to runefest and showed them
<super_> after the update
<t4> and showed them, frank_ 
<super_> and went to runefest
<super_> and showed it to thed evs
<super_> or something
<frank_> proof plos
<Mopman> i dont find that so hard to believe tbh
<t4> HEY GUISE LOCK ME UP RITE NOW
<t4> LOOK WHAT I DID LOL
<Mopman>  ya cuz its totally criminal to write rs bots
<t4> Mopman: over exaggeration 
<Shawnjohnsj> he took it on a flash drive and set it up on their dedicated PCs to play RS
<Mopman> ino :p
<Mopman> then he swung in from a rope
<Mopman> screaming FREEDOMMM
<frank_> as if jagex let you run shit on their pcs
<Mopman> and killed gower
<t4> idk i kinda agree with frank_ 
<Mopman> frank_: well we could have found out last year
<ramen> i run rsbuddy let me show you it
<t4> he seems like an intelligent guy
<Mopman> but you were too muc hof a pussy
<frank_> hah
<Mopman> and persuaded me not to do it
<t4> but the odds of a company
<t4> rolling out the red carpet 
<t4> for HIM
<frank_> like you were going to go anyway
<t4> doubtful
<Mopman> i srsly wanted to try that
<Mopman> but you
<Mopman> scared me
<Mopman> probably rightly
<ramen> t4 id imagine thats possible in real life
<ramen> they have no internets to hide behind
<frank_> if you were going to do anything, you should hand out business cards
<Mopman> i was going to hand out zetabot
<Mopman> on cd
<t4> frank_: have u read
<t4> https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,523421.msg3806973.html#msg3806973
<Mopman> but
<Mopman> i got the updater
<Mopman> looked at it and went
<Mopman> I AM NOT FIXING THAT
<t4> might give you insight to the claims
<frank_> yes
<t4> kk
<frank_> i didnt read it all cus i have a low tolerance to bullshit
<Mopman> haha
<Mopman> is this why you dont talk to me much anymore
<Mopman> makes sense
<Mopman> oh wait no thats the wow addiction
<t4> frank_: what you think really happened then?
<Budda> The topic or board you are looking for appears to be either missing or off limits to you.
<frank_> he put it in his "too hard" basket
<t4> kind of a stupid move
<frank_> botting didnt ruin the game
<Mopman> i still think its likely that they made some flippant comment about him doing placement there
<frank_> their grind design did
<Mopman> and he got excited and didnt want to ruin it
<Mopman> its a cheap way to stop him while possibly getting a reasonably proficient guy to do a placement
<Mopman> he is here, btw
<Mopman> while we sit talking abotu him
<Mopman> haha
<frank_> who cares
<t4> he's most likely asleep anyway
<frank_> if jagex offered me a job id take it, but i wouldnt stop what i was doing until i got my first pay cheque
<Mopman> he still plans to go to uni, from waht i gahtered
<Mopman> so its not like its a full time job nomsain
<Mopman> and them hiring him as some kind of secret anti cheat dev guy seems too far fetched to me
<frank_> they dont need an anti cheat guy
<frank_> they are doing fine
<Mopman> well yeah exactly

frank_ and his wisdom

Read full topic

item.title: Conversations with jacmob
item.dc:creator: @Wizzup Wizzup?
item.description:
@Wizzup wrote:

I don’t believe one bit of it. Remember Kaitnieks? Thought he made a deal with Jagex and got insta-banned.

15:54:42 < Jacmob> i would rather have gameplay changes 15:55:02 < Wizzup> jagex won't go after colour bots 15:55:06 <@sppt> hehehe 15:55:09 < Wizzup> they're such a minority and not breakable 15:55:17 < Wizzup> They'll ``break'' them anyway with their normal updates 15:55:19 <+vortex> i'd rather not play runescape 15:55:22 <@sppt> too bad jagex doesnt seem to realise what the reason is behind people botting 15:55:23 <+vortex> o i haven't played for years 15:55:24 <@sppt> such a shame 15:55:27 < P> vortex, ++ 15:55:33 < Jacmob> thats not quite true Wizzup there are things that may be done 15:55:38 < Jacmob> but ya its not a huge priority 15:55:42 < Wizzup> Such as, Project: ACID RUNESCAPE? 15:55:48 < Wizzup> or, RUNESCAPE FOR BLIND 15:55:53 < P> just make the xp rate 1000 nobody would fucking bot anyways! 15:55:58 < Niall> sppt: come play lotro with me gayslave yohan and rowan 15:56:02 < Wizzup> The only thing that really got colour bots before, they removed 15:56:06 < Wizzup> The Ent for example 15:56:07 <@sppt> lotro lollllllllllllll 15:56:09 < Wizzup> or Gas on rocks 15:56:12 < Wizzup> evil chicken 15:56:15 < Wizzup> They removed it all 15:56:17 < Wizzup> silly jagex 15:56:24 <@sppt> yes, because its annoying as shit Wizzup 15:56:32 < Wizzup> well, then they won't get colour bots 15:56:36 < Rictoo_> jaccy babe how you doin sexy 15:56:59 < Jacmob> there are other ways to break them, but again, i dont think that should be a priority 15:57:04 < Rictoo_> too bad jagex doesnt seem to realise what the reason is behind people botting 15:57:05 < Jacmob> simply because the gameplay needs changing anyway 15:57:11 < Rictoo_> majority are chinese gold farmers, iirc 15:57:13 < Rictoo_> so: money? 15:57:48 <@sppt> why would there be a market for gold farmers and RWT in general, Rictoo_ ? 15:57:55 < Wizzup> Jacmob: Name them 15:57:59 < Rictoo_> no, its not cuz game is boring sppt 15:58:03 < Rictoo_> all mmorpgs have gold farmers 15:58:04 < Wizzup> How will you break a bot that acts exactly like normal playeras 15:58:10 < Wizzup> By LOOKING at the screen 15:58:13 -!- ytuio9` [~ytuio9@OVER.9000] has joined #mopar 15:58:19 < Wizzup> You can't make a ``clusterflutter'' on the screen 15:58:22 <@sppt> yes, but runescape is quite an extreme if you ask me Rictoo_ 15:58:25 < Rictoo_> captchas 15:58:26 < Rictoo_> sleepwalker 15:58:27 < Rictoo_> dyl0ck 15:58:28 <@sppt> all it is is a glorified MUD 15:58:36 < Wizzup> reCaptcha came to mind yes 15:58:38 < ytuio9`> i reported u 2 mitb :) 15:58:41 < Jacmob> the bayesian anti-deformational priori flutterer 15:58:45 < ytuio9`> i hope ur account gets banned u fucking bitch :) 15:58:46 < Rictoo_> Wizzup, they used to have that 15:58:53 < Rictoo_> but rscn got past it :p 15:59:00 < Rictoo_> with cold feet or w/e the fuck it was called 15:59:06 < Rictoo_> sleepwalker maybe 15:59:22 < antiyou> sleepwalker indeed 15:59:36 < antiyou> hey Rictoo_ 15:59:37 < Rictoo_> good times 15:59:43 < Rictoo_> sup antiyou hows life treating you 15:59:54 < antiyou> still kickin 15:59:56 < antiyou> :P 16:00:03 < Rictoo_> cool 16:00:08 < bootnecklad> hai antiyou 16:00:13 < antiyou> hey booty 16:01:09 < ytuio9`> wtf i thought this was #rscode... 16:01:19 < antiyou> its not so gtfo 16:01:46 < ytuio9`> hey bro u think ur cool? 16:01:47 < ytuio9`> do u m8? 16:01:56 < ytuio9`> iĺl fkn 108 a cap in ur ass 16:02:18 < Rictoo_> you accidentally an ascii char 16:02:25 < Wizzup> Jacmob: I assume that is a ``I don't know''? 16:03:06 < Jacmob> there are a couple of things that that i cant mention but are pretty obvious 16:03:11 < Jacmob> one that 16:04:03 < Wizzup> Are you implying they'd hire someone who has been ruining their game 16:04:09 < Wizzup> I don't believe that crap 16:04:24 < Wizzup> If someone who'd ruin my game came at my door, I'd kick him out and file a lawsuit 16:04:26 < Wizzup> not hire him 16:04:55 < Wizzup> The same happened to kaitnieks 16:05:07 < Wizzup> made a deal, got instabanned, then he made scar 16:06:25 < Wizzup> so I don't buy it ;) 16:06:36 < eXemplar> me either 16:06:45 < Jacmob> im not trying to sell anything; i really dont care either way 16:06:45 < eXemplar> but either way, it doesn't affect me in the slightest, so i also don't care 16:06:49 -!- Brolapse [Dave@mopar-1E444AC5.cable.virginmedia.com] has joined #mopar 16:06:49 -!- mode/#mopar [+o Brolapse] by dongs 16:06:55 <@Brolapse> http://i.imgur.com/S5RQE.jpg 16:07:16 < eXemplar> if he does get hired, cool grats etc, if not then just another kinder lie 16:07:19 < eXemplar> either way, Mopman sucks 16:07:34 < eXemplar> Brolapse: this better be more nude pics 16:07:41 < eXemplar> alas, tis not 16:08:24 < ytuio9`> either way, Mopman sucks 16:09:17 < tree> i agree with wizzup

This is the first normal thing I saw him saying:

jagex were going to take down rsbuddy at some point if i hadn't decided to stop it
